name: payroll_id
description: Unique identifier for the payroll record.

name: employee_id
description: Employee ID associated with the payroll record.

name: pay_period_id
description: Pay period ID associated with the payroll record.

name: hours_worked_regular
description: Regular hours worked during the pay period.

name: hours_worked_overtime
description: Overtime hours worked during the pay period.

name: gross_pay
description: Gross pay for the pay period.

name: total_deductions
description: Total deductions for the pay period.

name: total_taxes
description: Total taxes for the pay period.

name: net_pay
description: Net pay for the pay period.

name: created_at
description: Timestamp when the payroll record was created.

name: updated_at
description: Timestamp when the payroll record was last updated.
